name: Mint Chocolate Crunch Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Add frozen banana, chocolate whey, mint extract, spinach, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy (should be thicker than a regular smoothie)
Pour into a bowl
Top with cacao nibs
Optional: Add more toppings like sliced banana, coconut flakes, or granola
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Mango Cream Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Add frozen mango, Greek yogurt, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with light granola
Optional: Add fresh mango slices, coconut flakes, or chia seeds
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Berry Blast Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 1 cup Frozen mixed berries (strawberries, blueberries, raspberries)
2 tbsp Fresh berries and granola (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen berries, banana, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with fresh berries and granola
Optional: Add chia seeds, hemp hearts, or coconut flakes
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced banana and crushed peanuts (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen bananas, peanut butter, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with sliced banana and crushed peanuts
Optional: Add chocolate chips, granola, or honey drizzle
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Tropical Paradise Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Shredded coconut and kiwi slices (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen pineapple, mango, banana, vanilla whey, and coconut milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with shredded coconut and kiwi slices
Optional: Add fresh pineapple, passion fruit, or granola
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Green Goddess Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced almonds and chia seeds (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen banana, spinach, avocado, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with sliced almonds and chia seeds
Optional: Add fresh berries, granola, or hemp hearts
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Strawberry Cheesecake Smoothie Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Graham cracker crumbs and fresh strawberries (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen strawberries, Greek yogurt, cream cheese, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with graham cracker crumbs and fresh strawberry slices
Optional: Add whipped cream or honey drizzle
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Classic Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Granola, fresh berries, and banana slices (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, banana, mixed berries, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with granola, fresh berries, and banana slices
Optional: Add honey drizzle, coconut flakes, or chia seeds
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Chocolate Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Chocolate chips, cacao nibs, and banana slices (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, banana, cocoa powder, chocolate whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with chocolate chips, cacao nibs, and banana slices
Optional: Add coconut flakes, granola, or strawberry slices
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Chocolate Peanut Butter Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Chocolate chips, crushed peanuts, and banana slices (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, banana, peanut butter, cocoa powder, chocolate whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with chocolate chips, crushed peanuts, and banana slices
Optional: Add granola, coconut flakes, or PB drizzle
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Tropical Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Fresh mango, pineapple, coconut flakes, and granola (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, mango, pineapple, banana, vanilla whey, and coconut milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with fresh mango, pineapple, coconut flakes, and granola
Optional: Add kiwi slices, passion fruit, or chia seeds
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Green Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Granola, kiwi slices, and chia seeds (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, banana, spinach, pineapple, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with granola, kiwi slices, and chia seeds
Optional: Add fresh berries, hemp hearts, or coconut flakes
Serve immediately with a spoon

name: Peanut Butter Banana Acai Bowl
ingredients: 2 tbsp Sliced banana, crushed peanuts, and granola (for topping)
instructions: Add frozen acai puree, bananas, peanut butter, vanilla whey, and almond milk to blender
Blend on high until thick and creamy
Should be thicker than a regular smoothie
Pour into a bowl
Top with sliced banana, crushed peanuts, and granola
Optional: Add honey drizzle, chia seeds, or coconut flakes
Serve immediately with a spoon
